time lag.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the period of time between two connected events
time lag.translation[0].definitions[0].e: There is generally a two-year time lag in the information being made available.
time lag.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a delay between an event and another event that is caused by it or connected with it
time lag.translation[1].definitions[0].e: There is a considerable time lag between orders and shipments.
